review: It worked for about 4 months but in the last month or so it refuses to play Netflix, giving a constant "We're having trouble playing this title right now..." type error (see picture).  I used to back out and start from a previous episode to 'trick' it into playing what we want.  At first I figured it was Netflix but after getting in another Roku 3 and hooking it up to the same TV (last weekend) the Roku had no problem with Netflix or any other channel.  Yes, I have expanded my allowed number of streaming devices on Netflix to include every TV that has a Roku or Fire TV so I am not trying to stream to too many devices at once.  Since we have dropped cable TV devices like this are our link to TV entertainment.  If someone has a fix or reason for the Fire TV to act congested when trying to play Netflix I would like to learn how to fix this since it is as of right now a product I can not recommend.
